title: Основано на реальных событиях
overview: "Based on Real Events" is a fascinating documentary detective story, where the host of the program Mikhail Gandelev, together with the audience, tries to understand the high-profile scandals of the rich and famous. The project combined popular television genres: TV series, investigation, secular and political intrigue, shows with stars. On the screen are exclusive footage captured by the NTV team, as well as stories that have never been published before. Detective methods of developing a theme, reconstruction of real incidents, unexpected conclusions, and, finally, the whole truth about the heroes, because the entire course of events will be recreated on air.
